data.text:
Tom One

London

Tom One, a fresh flavour in the electronic dance music scene. With a unique blend of breaks and groovy beats, infectious melodies and boundless energy, Tom One is an up and coming artist not to be missed. Tomâs musical voyage began whilst studying music at the University of Manchester in 2014 and found a love for producing dance music and DJing. Drawing inspiration from iconic artists such as Calvin Harris, Avicii and Dusky at the time, Tom immersed himself in the dance and house music scene, experimenting with ideas to create his unique style. His dedication finally paid off in February 2020 when he released his first single âAll I Need Is Youâ, featuring vocals from Georgie Wells which was instantly played on BBC Introducing. Tom the exploded onto the scene playing euphoric and energetic DJ sets across the UK and abroad. Beyond his performances, Tom continued to prove himself as a talented producer. In the summer of 2021, Tom released Let the Freedom Begin working with singer, Miranda Myles and saxophonist, JenJammin Sax, with the track now on over 130,000 streams worldwide and several plays on BBC Introducing, including the BBC Radio Solent Introducing best of 2021 show. Tom is known for his magnetic stage presence, charisma and energy. His vibrant personality and genuine connection with his fans have made him an admired figure within the dance music community, including that of his peers and collaborators. With a string of successful releases, exhilarating performances and an ever-growing fanbase, Tom One continues to rise!
